div.p: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order). Note that this information is not always sent with the order. There may be in some settings (e.g. hospitals) institutional or system support for completing the dispense details in the pharmacy department.

description.value: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order). Note that this information is not always sent with the order. There may be in some settings (e.g. hospitals) institutional or system support for completing the dispense details in the pharmacy department.

definition.value: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order). Note that this information is not always sent with the order. There may be in some settings (e.g. hospitals) institutional or system support for completing the dispense details in the pharmacy department.

short.value: Indicates the quantity or duration for the first dispense of the medication.

definition.value: Indicates the quantity or duration for the first dispense of the medication.

short.value: The minimum period of time that must occur between dispenses of the medication.

definition.value: The minimum period of time that must occur between dispenses of the medication.

short.value: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

definition.value: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

short.value: The maximum number of times the dispense can be repeated. For medication dispense, this integer does NOT include the original order dispense. This means that if an order indicates dispense 30 tablets plus 3 repeats, then the order can be dispensed a total of 4 times and the patient can receive a total of 120 tablets.

definition.value: The maximum number of times the dispense can be repeated. For medication dispense, this integer does NOT include the original order dispense. This means that if an order indicates dispense 30 tablets plus 3 repeats, then the order can be dispensed a total of 4 times and the patient can receive a total of 120 tablets.

short.value: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

definition.value: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

short.value: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

definition.value: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

short.value: Who this request is being addressed to.

definition.value: Who this request is being addressed to.
